summary: This mod adds player a new ring that allows you to follow any NPC in the game
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=4][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]  [color=#00ff00]GovnoWriter
[/color]
[color=#00ff00]Language[/color]: English

[color=#00ff00]Version: 1.00[/color]

[color=#00ff00]This[/color] mod works perfectly with all mods that add new [color=#00ff00]Companions or NPC[/color]

[color=#00ff00]This[/color] mod created for mods, that adding in game new [color=#00ff00]Companions[/color]

[color=#00ff00][color=#ffff00]Description:[/color] 

[/color][color=#00ff00][size=5]Any NPCs, Companions, Pets of any mods[/size][/color]

[color=#00ff00]This[/color] mod adds player a new ring that allows you to follow any [color=#00ff00]NPC[/color] in the game ([color=#00ff00]and from mods too[/color]). 

[color=#00ff00]To[/color] turn on and off Marche on the map you will be able the menu of the quests. Basically the mod was created for tracking companions, even those added by the mo[color=#00ff00]d[/color].

[youtube]Apx6gVtOTT4[/youtube]

[color=#00ff00]In [/color]order to begin to follow the desired NPC you need to put this ring in your inventory for this NPC and activate the ques[color=#00ff00]t[/color].
 
[color=#00ff00]The[/color] mod supports all the mods that add [color=#00ff00]NPCs[/color] or [color=#00ff00]Companions.[/color]

-- [color=#00ff00]Installation: [/color][color=#00ff00]Copy[/color] all from [color=#00ff00]archive[/color] in [color=#00ff00]Data[/color] folder

-- [color=#ffff00]Uninstallation:[/color]

- Data:
Remove TrackingMarker.esp;

- Scripts:
In Scripts folder remove QF_aaaTrackingMarkerQuest_01000D62

[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=4]My others mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/searchresults/?quicksrc_name=File+name&quicksrc_auth=govnowriter&quicksrc_game=110][color=#00ff00]GO[/color][/url][/size][/color]
author: GovnoWriter
